relevance_explanation: The `get_account_type_extra` tool call was removed and the resulting information (account type is 401K) was correctly inlined. The error handling logic was retained even though it is generally not customer specific and potentially redundant after `complete_case`.
completeness_explanation: All necessary steps and tool calls relevant to the customer were preserved. The trimmed routine appropriately includes address validation, address update, address hold (since client level is standard), and case completion.
